headers.value: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' *; script-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-inline' https://*.getbeamer.com https://www.googletagmanager.com https://*.ingest.sentry.io https://sentry.io unsafe-eval; frame-src http: https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.getbeamer.com https://*.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data:; worker-src 'self' blob:;img-src * data:;
